inclusion.criterion: Brazilian adolescents able to use smartphone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Adolescents with intellectual, sensory or physical disabilities
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Adolescents not capable to read and write/type
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 41-year-old man with Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. Lab studies show IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
